paragraphs: Mutiny is in the air. Doubt in the Commodore creeps through the crews ever since he got us into this mess. Rushing back here to divide our plunder instead of splitting off in different directions to evade our pursuers. A greedy man's blunder. He claims he's got a plan. One that will make us unbeatable, even against that Wayrest armada. Something he found in that moldy tome of his.
I'll believe it when I see it.
